## parallelLimit() function

Sames as  but limit the number of tasks that run concurrently.

Note: The resulting array may not be in the same order as the source array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function parallelLimit<T>(tasks: Array<AsyncTask<T>>, limit: number, options?: QueueOptions): Promise<T[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tasks | Array&lt;[AsyncTask](./promizr.asynctask.md)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;&gt; | The array of tasks to execute |
|  limit | number | The maximum number of tasks to run concurrently |
|  options | [QueueOptions](./promizr.queueoptions.md) | The options for the inner TaskQueue |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;T\[\]&gt;
